All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AreaPanel
This class represents an abstraction of the player's play area panel.
AreaScene
Base class of the player board, with shared behaviour of local and opponent playAreas.
Board
The main class of the model.
BoardController
The BoardController class manages the game board and player interactions.
BoardScene
This class implements GUI scene interface.
BoardStateMessage
This class implements tcp server message interface.
BoardStateUpdateEvent
This class represents a board state event.
BroadcastMessage
This record represents a broadcast message
Card
This represents a generic card.
CardFactory
This class represents an abstraction of a card factory, an object that instantiates card objects as requested.
CardListener
This interface defines an object which is listening to card's event.
CardPosition
Serializable record that represents the key information of a placed card in a playArea
CentralServer
This class is the main server that manages all the commands issued by the clients.
ChangeAreaAction
This action lets the user change the scene to the selected player's area.
ChangeAreaButton
This class represents a toggle button that when pressed displays the associated player area.
ChangeAreaPanel
This class implements a panel that lets the user know whether a player is connected or not and navigate between the player areas.
ChangeNotifications
This class acts as a database for all the events notified to the gui.
ChangePhaseEvent
This class represents an update event.
ChangeScoreEvent
This class represents an update event.
ChangeTurnEvent
This class represents an update event.
ChatDocument
This class represents the chat model, a document saving the chat history in order to be always displayed.
ChatHandler
This class acts as a router for the messages sent from client to client.
ChatListener
This interface defines the methods of an object that listens to chat events.
ChatPanel
This class implements the chat.
CheckMessage
This class implements the tcp server check interface.
ChooseColorAction
This class is an action that informs the input handler about the color chosen by the user.
ChooseColorCmd
The GameCommand associated with a player's color choice.
ChooseColorScene
This class implements a dialog to choose the player color.
ChooseMessage
This class implements tcp client message interface.
ChooseObjCmd
The GameCommand associated with a player's secret objective choice.
ChooseObjectiveScene
This class implements a dialog to choose the secret objective card.
Client
This class is the client starter.
ClientHandler
Thread that handles one tcp socket.
ClientProxy
This class implements virtual client interface and acts as server-side proxy
CommandPassthrough
This interface represents the skeletal structure of a proxy client-side.
ConnectionScene
This class represents the connection frame.
ConnectMessage
This class implements tcp client message interface.
ConsoleBackgroundColors
Collection of ANSI background colors
ConsoleColorsCombiner
Helper class with methods to manipulate ANSI color codes.
ConsoleTextColors
Collection of ANSI text (foreground) colors
Corner
The corner class implements the functionality of a corner in the card.
CornerCoverGoldCard
This class represents the gold card strategy that gives point based on how many corners the card covers.
CornerDirection
Enumeration of possible direction where a corner can be (all diagonals from the center of the card)
CornerJ
This class represents a serializable lightweight version of a corner with the skeletal structure defined in the json files.
CornerListener
This interfaced defines a corner listener.
CrashStateError
This class is an error event that notifies about a crash.
CreationState
The CreationState class represents the game state during the creation phase, where players join and the game setup is done.
DeckCardUpdateMessage
This class represents a deck message.
DeckEmptyMessage
This class represents a deck message.
DeckEvent
This class represents an update event.
DeckException
Signals that a request cannot be fulfilled by the specified deck.

This interface defines the skeleton of a deck listener.
DeckMessage
This class implements the tcp server message interface.
DeckRevealEvent
This class represents a deck event.
DeckStateFullDrawableMessage
This class represents a deck message that notifies of a deck that contains at least three cards at initialization, one for each position.

This class represents a deck message.

This class inherits from deck message class.

This class represents a deck event.

This class represents a rmi update.

View exception to be thrown on a disconnection explicitly called by the user

This class implements tcp client message.

This class represents the endgame scene.
EndgameState
The EndgameState class represents the state of the game during the endgame phase, where the game is evaluated and scores are calculated.

This class implements tcp server message interface.

This class represents a deck event, triggered by a card being drawn and the top card being replaced.

This class implements the action that flips cards.

GameColor
This enumeration class stores all the color values used into the gui
GameCommand
This class provides the basic interface for game commands.
GameEvent
This interface defines a game event.
GameGUI
This class acts as the GUI main controller class.
GameInputHandler
This class acts as the handler for all the user inputs that either modify the gui or are sent to the server.
GameListener
This interface represents a listener in the observer pattern.
GamePhase
Enumeration of all phases of the game (as in particular states the game can be in at a given time)
GamePoint
Record representing 2D coordinates.
GameResource
Enumeration of game's resources.
GameResourceLabel
This class represents a game visible resource to display.
GameState
Represents the abstract state of the game.
GameSubject
This interface represents a subject of an observer pattern.
GameWindow
This is the main frame of the UI.
GoldCard
This class represents the gold card, which is mainly responsible for scoring points.
GoldCardDeserializer
This class implements the deserializer for lightweight gold cards.
GoldCardDeserializerView
View gold card deserializer class.
GoldCardFactory
This class represents a card factory for gold cards.
GoldCardJSON
This class implements a lightweight version of the gold card as defined in the json file.
GoldCardStrategy
Common interface for all gold card strategies to calculate the score multiplier on card's placement
GotoEndgameEvent
This class represents an event triggered by reaching the endgame.

This interface implements scene and structures a GUI scene.
GUIEvent
This interface defines gui events.

This class extends UIFunctions class.

This class represents a rmi update.
IllegalActionError
This class is a remote error event and reports about an illegal action.

This class is a remote event and reports about an illegal access error.
IllegalParameterError
This class is a remote error and represents an illegal parameter error.
IllegalStateError
This class represents a remote error event and reports about an illegal state.
IndirectDisconnectEvent
This class is a remote error event and reports about an indirect disconnection event.
ItemCountGoldCard
This class implements the gold card strategy that gives points for each visible resource of the specified type on the player's play area.
JoinState
Represents the game state during which players are joining the game.
JsonFunctions
This is a helper class containing json deserializing methods.
JsonFunctionsView
This class is a helper for json functions.
JsonImporter
Class that provides an interface to get cards from JSON.
ListenException
Signals that an error occurred while handling the event.

This class represents the board view of the local user.
LoginPanel
This class represents a login panel.
ModelUpdater
This class acts as the view model updater: updates the lightweight representation of the server board.

This class represents a gui action.
NetworkEvent
This interface extends game event and structures a network event.
NetworkEventRecord
This class implements a record of the happened network events.
NotificationScene
Default empty scene to always be able to receive notifications

This class represents a rmi update.
NotifyIndirectDisconnect
This class represents a rmi update.
NotifyTimeoutEvent
This class handles indirect disconnection by timeout event.
ObjectiveCard
This represents a generic card.
ObjectiveCardDeserializer
This class implements the deserializer for objective cards.
ObjectiveCardDeserializerView
View objective card deserializer class.
ObjectiveDeck
The objective deck is composed of 16 objective cards at the start of the game which are then distributed as follows:
- 2 cards are revealed on the ground;
- 1 card is drawn from the deck by each player.
ObjectiveStrategy
Common interface for all objectives.
OnlyRevealedSetDeckStateUpdate
This class represents a rmi update.
OpponentAreaPanel
This class represents an opponent play area view (view-only).
OpponentAreaScene
This class extends area scene and implements an opponent board view.
OpponentHandPanel
This class extends hand panel and represents an opponent hand view.
Parser
Parser for all server-related commands on the TUI.
PatternObjective
Pattern for objective cards that require it

String pattern convention: * = any card
R,G,B,P = Red, Green, Blue, Purple card corner positions are TL, TR, BR, BL to the center card the positions between corners are the top, bottom, left, right cards e.g.
PatternObjectiveStrategy
Objective strategy for objectives that use a 3x3 pattern of cards (identified by color)
PhaseUpdate
This class represents a rmi update.
PingEvent
This class is classified as an error event due to its special nature.

This interface describes messages sent by the client to the server.

This class implements the virtual client using socket connection protocol
TCPMessage
This interface represents a simple TCPMessage.
TCPServerCheckMessage
This interface portrays the checks sent from the server to the client.
TCPServerMessage
This interface represents messages sent by the client to the server.
TCPServerSocket
This class acts as a gateway accepting connections requests and then handling different sockets with client handlers.
TimeoutException
View exception to be thrown after the client is notified by the server of being forcefully disconnected due to a timeout
TUI
Main class of the TUI.
TUI_Scene
Common parent class of all TUI scenes.
TUIEvent
This interface defines tui events.
TUIParser
Parser for all command inputs on the TUI.
TurnTimer
A timer that handles a player's turn duration, sending periodic pings to the player to keep the connection alive and disconnecting the player if they exceed their turn time.
TurnTimerController
The TurnTimerController delivers an interface that can be used to control the timers of a turn.
TurnUpdate
This class represents a rmi update.
UIFunctions
This class implements functions that are common to both the UI implementations.
UpdateEvent
This interface extends network event and represents an update event as opposed to an error event.

This class implements an update task.

This class implements tcp server message interface.
